credit_line: Museum purchase from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Signature Collection, "Picnic Flatware"
description:
(1) Flat rectangular aluminum handle with brushed surface, adonized green. Rectangular blade adonized purple with rounded outer point and bevelled cutting edge. Blade affixed to handle side with three silver rivets.
(2) Flat rectangular aluminum handle with brushed surface, adonized blue. Rectangular head with four tapering tines adonized purple, affixed to handle side with three silver rivets.
(3) Flat rectangular aluminum handle with brushed surface, adonized purple. Round bowl adonized gold and affixed to handle side with three silver rivets.
(10) Flat rectangular handle of grey aluminum; brushed surface. Circular, concave bowl with flanged extension to overlap handle. Bowl affixed to handle with two silver rivets. Bowl anodized blue.
name: Picnic set
